comment: *******  These are shared navigation hotspots.  Add hotspots you would like to appear on every page here. To exclude a hotspot from a subview, catch and stop the hotspot event in the controller

navigation.style: background-color:blue; left:700px; margin-top:700px; width:100px; height:80px; z-index:400000;
background-color:blue; left:800px; margin-top:700px; width:130px; height:80px; z-index:400000;
background-color:blue; left:930px; margin-top:700px; width:94px; height:80px; z-index:400000;
background-color:blue; left:725px; margin-top:-20px; width:300px; height:120px; z-index:400000;

states.comment: hotspot nodes per state.  Enter a gesture event attribute to the hotspot ( can be any or all: swipeleft, swiperight, swipeup, swipedown, tap ) the value is the state you want the gesture to trigger on that hotspot
